# init(elevationStyle:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new imagery based map configuration with the specified elevation style.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(elevationStyle: MKMapConfiguration.ElevationStyle)
```

## Parameters

- **elevationStyle**: One of the [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMapConfiguration/ElevationStyle-swift.enum] elevation styles.

## Creating a map imagery configuration

- **init()**: Creates a new imagery based map configuration.
